name: The Maze (itch) (Ratun Rahman, Saimul)
description:
You can also download PC, Mac & Linux version from here...

Hello! Thank you for reading this. This is a puzzle type game that me (graphic designer) and Md Saimul Haque Shanto (Programmer) have created for B&W Jam.

It is a two player maze game where a player WHITE will play with 'wasd' and another player BLACK will play with arrows. Player's objective is to collect five same colored balls as the player. Whoever gets first, wins! There are three difficulties (easy, medium and hard) maps. Player can see the minimap but BE CAREFUL! It wont stay for long and you will realize the value of it when its gone...

Controls: 

White: w=up, s=down, a=left, d=right

Black: up arrow = up, down arrow = down, left arrow = left, right arrow = right.
